lines.gurmukhi: kr AMjul jl jobn pRvysu AwlI; mwn qij pRwnpiq piq riq mwnIAY [

Unknown.translation: O! friend entering in youth! abandon all ego and take water (of humility) in your hand, worship the Lord husband the Master of all lives and lodge His love in your heart.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: hy juAwnI ivc pRvyS kr rhI sKIey! h`Qwˆ dy bu`kivc pwxI lY; mwn C`f ky pRwnpqI dw pUjn kr qy pqI dy pRym nUM mwx[

lines.gurmukhi: gMDrb ngr gq rjnI ibhwq jwq; AOsur ABIc Aiq dulB kY jwnIAY [

Unknown.translation: Like an imaginary world, this night-like life being imaginary is passing by. So consider this human birth as an invaluable opportunity that stars have favoured you with for meeting the Lord God.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: dyK gMDrb ngrI dI cwly rwq bIq rhI hY, ies SuB mhUrq nUM Aiq durlB smwˆ kr ky jwx[

lines.gurmukhi: ishjw kusm kumlwq murJwq pun; pun pCuqwq smo Awvq n AwnIAY [

Unknown.translation: As the flowers on the nuptial bed withers away, this invaluable time once gone past will not return. One will repent repeatedly.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: syjw dy Pul kumlwauˆdy qy murJwauˆdy jwˆdy hn; iPr pCuqweIdw hY igAw smwˆ moV ky ilAwieAwˆ nhIˆ ilAwieAw jw skdw[

lines.gurmukhi: soeI br nwir ipRX pÎwr AiDkwrI pÎwrI; smJ isAwnI qoso bynqI bKwnIAY [659[

Unknown.translation: O dear friend! I pray to you to be wise and understand this important fact, that she alone is supreme seeker female, who becomes dejure owner of her Lord's love and, ultimately becomes His beloved.  (659)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: auho hI sRySt qy ipAwrI iesqrI huMdI hY jo ipAwry dy ipAwr dI h`kdwr bxdI hY; qUM isAwxI bx qy smJ qYnUM mYˆ iesy kr ky bynqI kIqI hY ]659]
